A4. Pebbling odometer - subtask 4
code:
odometer
# Start by collecting pebbles row by row and column by column
start:
pebble collect # If there's a pebble in the current cell, go to the collect label
border next_row # If we're at the border of the grid, move to the next row
move
jump start

collect:
get # Pick up the pebble
jump start

next_row:
right
move
right
border halt_program # If we're at the southern border, we're done
jump traverse_row

traverse_row:
move
border back_to_start # If we're at the eastern border, move back to the starting column
jump traverse_row

back_to_start:
left
move
left
border start # If we're at the western border, return to the start of the loop
jump back_to_start

halt_program:
halt

title: A4. Pebbling odometer - subtask 4
code:
plaintext
# Start by scanning the entire grid row by row and column by column
collect_pebbles:
pebble move_to_cell # If there is a pebble in the current cell, move to it
border next_row # If we reach the border of the grid, move to the next row
move # Move to the next cell in the row
jump collect_pebbles # Continue scanning

move_to_cell:
get # Pick up the pebble from the current cell
return_to_corner:
border move_up # If at the border, move upward
left
move
right
jump return_to_corner # Keep moving until reaching the north-west corner

next_row:
left # Turn left to move downward
move
left # Turn left again to face the next row
jump collect_pebbles # Continue scanning the grid

title: A4. Pebbling odometer - subtask 4
code:
plaintext
# Start by initializing the direction and movement
right             # Face east to traverse the row
collect_row:
    pebble collect_pebble # Check if the current cell has a pebble
    border next_row       # If at the last column, move to the next row
    move                  # Otherwise, move to the next cell in the row
    jump collect_row      # Continue scanning the current row

collect_pebble:
    get                   # Pick up the pebble
    left                  # Turn north
    move                  # Move toward (0, 0)
    right                 # Face east again
    pebble collect_pebble # Check if this cell has another pebble
    right                 # Turn east
    jump collect_row      # Resume scanning the row

next_row:
    right                 # Turn south to move to the next row
    move                  # Move down to the next row
    right                 # Turn east again to scan the new row
    border done           # If we're at the last row, finish
    jump collect_row      # Continue scanning the new row

done:
    halt                  # End the program

title: A4. Pebbling odometer - subtask 4
code:
plaintext
# Start by ensuring the odometer is facing east
right
start:
# Check if the current cell has at least one pebble
pebble collect
# If no pebbles are found, move forward
border next_row
move
jump start

collect:
# Pick up all pebbles from the current cell
get
pebble collect
# Return to cell (0, 0) to drop off all collected pebbles
return_home:
border done
left
move
jump return_home

done:
# Drop off all collected pebbles

title: A4. Pebbling odometer - subtask 4
code:
plaintext
# Start collecting pebbles from the entire grid to cell (0, 0)
start:
pebble collect # If there's a pebble in the current cell, collect it
border next_row # If we are at a border, move to the next row
move # Move to the next cell in the current row
jump start # Continue searching for pebbles in the same row
collect:
get # Remove a pebble from the current cell
jump return_to_start # Go back to the starting cell (0, 0) to deposit the pebble
return_to_start:
border deposit # If on a border, deposit the pebble
move # Move towards (0, 0)
jump return_to_start # Keep moving towards (0, 0)
deposit:
put # Deposit the pebble in cell (0, 0)
jump start # Resume searching for more pebbles
next_row:
right # Turn right to move down to the next row
move # Move down one row
right # Turn right again to face the next row
jump start # Resume searching in the new row
halt # Terminate the program

A2. Pebbling odometer - subtask 2
code:
odometer
# Move to cell (0, 1) to compare the number of pebbles
right
move

# Compare pebbles
compare_pebbles:
pebble cell_0_1 # If cell (0, 1) has pebbles, jump to cell_0_1
border cell_0_0 # If no pebbles in cell (0, 1), jump to cell_0_0
get # Remove one pebble from cell (0, 1)
left
move
put # Add one pebble to cell (0, 0)
right
move
jump compare_pebbles

# If x  y, return to cell (0, 0)
cell_0_0:
left
move
halt

# If x > y, remain in cell (0, 1)
cell_0_1:
halt

title: A2. Pebbling odometer - subtask 2
code:
plaintext
# Start in cell (0, 0)
right
move # Move to cell (0, 1)

compare_pebbles:
get
pebble greater_than_or_equal
put
jump end_comparison

greater_than_or_equal:
left
move # Move back to cell (0, 0)
halt

end_comparison:
right
move # Move to cell (0, 1)
halt

title: A2. Pebbling odometer - subtask 2
code:
plaintext
# Move to cell (0, 1)
right
move
# Compare pebbles in (0, 0) and (0, 1)
compare:
pebble greater # If (0, 1) has pebbles, jump to greater
left
move
halt
greater:
get
left
move
put
right
move
jump compare

title: A2. Pebbling odometer - subtask 2
code:
odometer
# Move to cell (0, 1) to compare pebbles
right
move

# Loop to compare pebbles
compare:
pebble greater  # If there is a pebble in (0, 1), check next
get             # Remove one pebble from (0, 1)
left
move
put             # Add one pebble to (0, 0)
right
move
jump compare    # Repeat the comparison

# Label when pebbles in (0, 1) are exhausted
greater:
left
move
halt            # Halt at cell (0, 0)

title: A2. Pebbling odometer - subtask 2
code:
odometer
# Move to cell (0, 1)
right
move

# Compare pebbles in (0, 1) with (0, 0)
# If cell (0, 1) has fewer pebbles, jump back to (0, 0)
compare:
get
left
move
put
right
move
pebble less_than_or_equal # If cell (0, 1) has pebbles remaining, jump to less_than_or_equal
jump greater # Otherwise, jump to greater

# Handle the case where x <= y
less_than_or_equal:
left
move
right
halt

# Handle the case where x > y
greater:
left
move
right
halt
